PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-13122019-09-04IRCC,  PS,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAvoiding Complicity in Mistreatment by Foreign Entities Act
SubjectAvoiding Complicity in Mistreatment by Foreign Entities ** Deputy Minister of Citizenship and Immigration **
PrecisOrder authorizing the ISSUANCE of written directions to the Deputy Minister of Citizenship and Immigration respecting the disclosure of, and request for information required by the AVOIDING COMPLICITY IN MISTREATMENT BY FOREIGN ENTITIES ACT, in order to demonstrate a whole-of-government ownership and responsibility for avoiding complicity in mistreatment, and broaden the application of measures to prevent mistreatment to government as a whole.
AttachmentsAttachment
